Package com.paydiant.android.core.facade

Contains the core facade service implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IApplicationInformationManagerFacade
    The Interface IApplicationInformationManagerFacade.
    IATMCashManagerFacade  
    ICustomerManagerFacade
    The Interface ICustomerManagerFacade.
    IDeviceInfoManagerFacade
    Facade defining the operations to manage the device specific information, such as device attributes, device specific ids/tokens etc.
    IGiftAccountManagerFacade
    The Interface defining operations related to gift accounts.
    IImageDownloadManagerFacade
    The Interface IImageDownloadManagerFacade.
    ILoyaltyManagerFacade
    This defines the operations required to manage loyalty.
    IOfferManagerFacade
    The Interface IOfferManagerFacade.
    IOrderHistoryManagerFacade
    The Interface IOrderHistoryManager.
    IPaydiantGCMUtilityFacade
    Interface defining the utility methods to support GCM (Google Cloud Messaging) client registration on Paydiant Server.
    IPaydiantLoggingManagerFacade
    Provides facilities to send application logs to the mobile gateway for app error troubleshooting
    IPaymentAccountManagerFacade
    Interface for the PaymentAccountManagerFacade.
    IPreferenceManagerFacade
    The Interface IPreferenceManagerFacade.
    IQRCodeManagerFacade
    The Interface IQRCodeDecoderManagerFacade.
    IReceiptManagerFacade
    The Interface IReceiptManagerFacade.
    ISecureCloudManagerFacade Deprecated
    This class is deprecated as of sdk v6.4.
    ISecurityManagerFacade
    Interface for the SecurityManagerFacade.
    ITransactionFlowManagerFacade
    The Interface defining operations for transaction flows.
    ITransactionHistoryManagerFacade Deprecated
    Use IReceiptManagerFacade instead.
    ITransactionManagerFacade
    The Interface ITransactionManagerFacade.
    IUserRegistrationManagerFacade
    The Interface IUserRegistrationManagerFacade.

    A utility class to support SDK internal logging of successful/failed events.

    This class is deprecated as of sdk v6.4.

    The Class SecurityManagerFacade.
    TransactionFlowManagerFacade
    Provides the implementations for the transaction flow operations defined in the ITransactionFlowManagerFacade .

Package com.paydiant.android.core.facade Description

Contains the core facade service implementations.
